name: intelectin 1
summary: Enables calcium ion binding activity; identical protein binding activity; and oligosaccharide binding activity. Involved in positive regulation of glucose import; positive regulation of protein phosphorylation; and protein homotrimerization. Located in extracellular exosome. Part of receptor complex. [provided by Alliance of Genome Resources, Apr 2022]
